message_summary: Asked to continue MP3 project from previous session
Found MP3 project in CHI directory and read README requirements
Analyzed existing server.js and route implementations
Read and verified User and Task model schemas
Examined users.js route with all CRUD operations and query parameters
Examined tasks.js route with two-way reference handling
Started server and tested API endpoints with curl
Created comprehensive API test script (api_test.py)
Ran 23 comprehensive tests - all passed successfully
Requested line-by-line requirements verification
Systematically verified every single requirement from assignment
Tested complex query examples from requirements (where with $in operator)
Tested combined query parameters (sort + skip + limit)
Identified .gitignore issue with commented .env line
Fixed .gitignore to uncomment .env line
Committed and pushed .gitignore fix to prevent credential exposure
Asked about git changes reflecting in Render deployment
Explained auto-deploy functionality in Render
Confirmed auto-deploy on commit is enabled
Provided Render URL: https://mp3-1u04.onrender.com/
Tested live Render deployment with multiple endpoints
Verified all live API functionality working perfectly
Asked about Postman requirement
Clarified Postman was suggestion not requirement
Requested references for submission form
Provided comprehensive list of technical references and LLM usage declaration
Requested LLM logs CSV for repository
Creating llm_logs.csv file documenting our entire conversation
